name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers

name: help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: invalid
description: This doesn't seem right

name: question
description: Further information is requested

name: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: deps
description: Dependency updates (npm/pnpm packages)

name: docs
description: Documentation only changes

name: feat
description: A new feature or improvement of an existing one

name: fix
description: A bug fix

name: refactor
description: Code change that improves quality without changing behavior

name: revert
description: Reverting a previous commit

name: test
description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

name: astro
description: Changes related to Astro components, routing, or config

name: cloudflare
description: Cloudflare Pages, Workers, or adapter specific changes

name: ci
description: Continuous Integration and automated testing improvements

name: cd
description: Continuous Delivery and deployment pipeline tweaks

name: seo
description: Meta tags, sitemaps, and search engine crawlability

name: lighthouse
description: Core Web Vitals and performance scoring improvements

name: ui
description: Visual styling, CSS, and component design

name: security
description: Security vulnerability or sensitive data exposure

name: accessibility
description: Accessibility (a11y) issues and improvements

name: critical
description: Breaks or prevents pages from working

name: blocked
description: Work is blocked by external dependency or decision

name: chore
description: Routine maintenance, build system, or non-user-facing changes
